name: Size
title: OBSOLETE - CS Tumor Size
notes: **Note**:  CS Tumor Size is obsolete beginning with CS Version 2 (codes and notes).  Old data are retained, but new cases are not coded with CS Tumor Size.  Use code 988 for this field.
rows:
OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

No mass/tumor found

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

001-979 millimeters (code exact size in millimeters)

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

980 millimeters or larger
(Includes cases converted from codes 981-989 during conversion to V0200)

OBSOLETE DATA CONVERTED V0200
See code 980

981-987 millimeters

CONVERTED AND CODE REUSED V0200
Prior to V0200 code defined as "988 millimeters".  Cases converted to code 980 with V0200 and code 988 redefined as "Not applicable: Information not collected for this schema".

Not applicable: Information not collected for this schema

OBSOLETE DATA CONVERTED V0200
See code 980

989 millimeters or larger

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

Microscopic focus or foci only, no size of focus given

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

Described as "less than 1 cm"

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

Described as "less than 2 cm," or "greater than 1 cm," or "between 1 cm and 2 cm"

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

Described as "less than 3 cm," or "greater than 2 cm," or "between 2 cm and 3 cm"

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

Described as "less than 4 cm," or "greater than 3 cm," or "between 3 cm and 4 cm"

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

Described as "less than 5 cm," or "greater than 4 cm," or "between 4 cm and 5 cm"

OBSOLETE DATA RETAINED V0200

Unknown; size not stated
Not documented in patient record
